original_title: The Magical Guru and His Secret Mantra
overview: About an Indian Guru and his ancient mantra-meditation technique which helps in curing of Physical, Mental, Spiritual & Materialistic problems. The film shares the mantra-meditation, explores the science behind & interviews benefited people.
tagline: Can a mantra meditation drive away all wrong from your life?
title: The Magical Guru and His Secret Mantra
